{"id":994654048,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1689372576,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"174 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/994654048/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Apply Operations to Make All Array Elements Equal to Zero","memory":"93.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkArray(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int currentWindowSum=0,n=nums.size();\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            if(currentWindowSum>nums[i]) return false;\n            nums[i]-=currentWindowSum;\n            currentWindowSum+=nums[i];\n            if(i>=k-1) currentWindowSum-=nums[i-k+1];\n        }      \n        return currentWindowSum==0;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"apply-operations-to-make-all-array-elements-equal-to-zero","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
